guide.introduction:
This is a super simple recipe that takes advantage of the season's harvest.

Ingredients:

4 medium cucumbers

4 onions

Salt

2 cups sugar

1 cup vinegar

2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley
guide.introduction_rendered:
This is a super simple recipe that takes advantage of the season's harvest.

Ingredients:

4 medium cucumbers

4 onions

Salt

2 cups sugar

1 cup vinegar

2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley

lines.text: Slice Cucumber and Onions:  Take four medium cucumbers and slice them. Also slice thinly four onions.
lines.text_raw: Slice Cucumber and Onions:  Take four medium cucumbers and slice them. Also slice thinly four onions.

lines.text: Layering: In a large bowl or jar, lay down a layer of cucumbers and then a layer of onions on top of that. Lightly salt the layer and then add another layer of cucumbers, onions, and sprinkling of salt. Continue layering until vegetables are used up.
lines.text_raw: Layering: In a large bowl or jar, lay down a layer of cucumbers and then a layer of onions on top of that. Lightly salt the layer and then add another layer of cucumbers, onions, and sprinkling of salt. Continue layering until vegetables are used up.

lines.text: Refrigerate Overnight: Seal the pickle container and refrigerate over night, letting the cukes release their moisture.
lines.text_raw: Refrigerate Overnight: Seal the pickle container and refrigerate over night, letting the cukes release their moisture.

lines.text: Next mix together two cups of sugar, one cup of white vinegar, and 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley in a saucepan.
lines.text_raw: Next mix together two cups of sugar, one cup of white vinegar, and 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley in a saucepan.

lines.text: Cook  on stovetop until sugar dissolves.
lines.text_raw: Cook  on stovetop until sugar dissolves.

lines.text: Remove the cucumbers from the refrigerator and drain off excess liquid.
lines.text_raw: Remove the cucumbers from the refrigerator and drain off excess liquid.

lines.text: Then pour hot sugar syrup over top of the cukes and return to the refrigerator.
lines.text_raw: Then pour hot sugar syrup over top of the cukes and return to the refrigerator.

lines.text: The pickles will be ready to eat the following day. They will store in the refrigerator for several weeks.
lines.text_raw: The pickles will be ready to eat the following day. They will store in the refrigerator for several weeks.

guide.summary: Here's how to make my grandma's delicious refrigerator pickle recipe.
